title: Beef & beetroot burgers with tangy herb dressing

ingredients.item: 400g pack Waitrose Aberdeen Angus Beef Lean Mince (Typically 5% Fat)
4 tbsp essential Waitrose Low Fat Vinaigrette
½ x 25g pack flat leaf parsley, finely chopped, plus a few extra leaves to serve
2 tbsp capers, chopped, plus extra to scatter
1 essential Waitrose Little Gem Lettuce, shredded

instructions.step: Preheat the grill to high. Place the onion, beetroot and celery between some kitchen paper and press firmly to squeeze out as much juice as possible.

Put into a bowl with the minced beef and oregano. Season and combine the ingredients with your hands. Divide the mixture into 4 burgers. Place on a foil-lined grill rack and grill for 15 minutes, turning once until firm, brown and cooked through.

Combine the vinaigrette, parsley, capers and a little black pepper in a bowl. Remove the burgers and briefly grill the baps to heat through. Serve them topped with the lettuce and burgers. Drizzle over the dressing and add the reserved parsley and capers to serve.
